```{r}
f <- function(x){
  y <- 3/4 *(1-x^2)
  y[x < -1|x>1] <- 0
  return(y)
}

F <- function(x){
  y <- -x^3/4 + 3*x/4 + 1/2
  y[x<= -1] <- 0
  y[x>1] <- 1
  return(y)
}
p <- ggplot(data.frame(x = c(-2,2)), aes(x=x))
p+stat_function(fun=f)
p+stat_function(fun=F)
```
